arts.ttl: What goalscoring streak could Mbappe extend in Marseille clash?
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappe will be aiming to extend a Champions League goalscoring streak in Tuesday's clash with Marseille at the Santiago Bernabeu.

Real Madrid are unbeaten in La Liga so far, winning all four of their games this campaign. Kylian Mbappe is the man in form at the moment, contributing five goals and assists combined. Marseille have...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Marseille: Predicted Lineup for Champions League Clash
arts.sum: CB: Dean Huijsen - After his controversial red card against La Real, the Spanish international will start against Marseille in their Champions League debut. RB: Trent Alexander-Arnold - After being benched once again this weekend against Real Sociedad, the Englishman should be given a starting berth by his coach for Madrid's first Champions League game of the new season.

arts.ttl: Three talking points ahead of Real Madrid vs Marseille | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Four games into the new La Liga season, Real Madrid are preparing to enter a new competition for the first time this campaign and it is none other than the UEFA Champions League. Having learnt their eight opponents for the league stage late last month, Los Blancos are now set to take part in their […] The post Three talking points ahead of Real Madrid vs Marseille | UEFA Champions League appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Marseille in the Champions League
arts.sum: Alonso is looking forward to his first venture in the competition with the white team, but he was still fielding questions about refereeing in La Liga. Alonso: We spoke after the game, and I've already said all I needed to say to you in the press conference following the match.

arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 1 Predictions: PSG to be tested at home
arts.sum: The Champions League league phase begins this week and Warren Ashurst has provided a correct score prediction for all 18 games.

arts.ttl: Bellingham in Real Madrid return for Marseille tie
arts.sum: Fit-again England midfielder Jude Bellingham is named in Real Madrid's squad for Tuesday's opening Champions League fixture against Marseille.

arts.ttl: Delight for Alonso as Real Madrid announce double fitness boost for Marseille clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid recover Jude Bellingham and Eduardo Camavinga for Tuesday's Champions League clash against Marseille, with both players returning to the squad.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Marseille Preview: Start Time, Team News, How To Watch, Live Stream & Odds
arts.sum: The two teams faced off only four times in the competition, with Real Madrid winning all of their games against Marseille. Real Madrid will host Olympique de Marseille at the Santiago Bernabéu to open their Champions League campaign on September 16.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid name squad to face Marseille, featuring two major returns
arts.sum: The squad of players called upon by La Liga giants Real Madrid for the club’s European opener has been unveiled online. And it features an altogether noteworthy pair of inclusions.…
